summary: Peter Pinkerton studied at Glasgow and Dublin. After teaching at various schools he became Rector of Glasgow High School.
biografia:
Peter Pinkerton
's father was  John Pinkerton
(
born in Ireland in
1833)
who was a foreman boiler maker. His mother was  Mary Harvey
(
born in Stromness, Orkney in
1835)
. Peter Pinkerton had five older brothers: William
(
born about
1855)
, David
(
born about
1857)
, John
(
born about
1859)
, Robert
(
born about
1862)
and James
(
born about
1864)
. He had a younger brother Samuel
(
born about
1873)
.
An obituary of Peter Pinkerton, written by
John Dougall
, was published in the
Proceedings
of the
Edinburgh Mathematical Society
at
THIS LINK
.
